text: Ibanez is a company that makes guitars. The company is from Nagoya, Aichi, Japan. The company was started by Hoshino Gakki. The company is very big and sells many guitars to musicians. == Other websites == *Ibanez guitars and bass museum - Ibanez instruments database, resources, user reviews, pictures *History of Hoshino Gakki Co., Ltd. *Ibanez Register - Gallery of past and present Ibanez guitars and basses. Category:Guitars Category:Manufacturing companies of Japan Category:Nagoya
title: Ibanez
